items.content_html: WordPress Theme Inspector for Developers is a lightweight tool that helps developers quickly check the active theme folder and the template used on single pages. It simplifies debugging and theme customization, making development faster and more efficient.

It simplifies debugging and theme customization, making development faster and more efficient.
